sentences: She assesses the software-related risks for the medical device at every design review.

Doesn't she assess the software-related risks when a defect is re-opened?
Assess the software-related risks now and log them in the ISO 14971 file.
How comprehensively she assesses the software-related risks each time!
She is assessing the software-related risks right now while the hazard analysis team observes.
She is not assessing the software-related risks because the latest clinical data are still importing.
Is she assessing the software-related risks on the new insulin-pump firmware this afternoon?
Isn't she assessing the software-related risks even though the severity rating just increased?
Assess the software-related risks right away and update the risk matrix.
How diligently she is assessing the software-related risks despite last-minute changes!
She has assessed the software-related risks for four release candidates this quarter.
She has not assessed the software-related risks since the cybersecurity patch was merged.

She has been assessing the software-related risks all morning without taking a break.

Assess the software-related risks today and archive the evidence.

She was assessing the software-related risks when the power failure hit the lab.

Was she assessing the software-related risks at three o’clock as planned?
Wasn't she assessing the software-related risks when the reviewer called?
Assess the software-related risks before noon and export the report.
How methodically she was assessing the software-related risks despite constant interruptions!
She had assessed the software-related risks before the notified body requested objective evidence.
She had not assessed the software-related risks by the time the sprint retrospective began.
Had she assessed the software-related risks on the legacy code branch?
Hadn't she assessed the software-related risks before the usability study started?
Assess the software-related risks before leaving and sign the checklist.
How completely she had assessed the software-related risks ahead of schedule!
She had been assessing the software-related risks for hours when the critical vulnerability surfaced.
She had not been assessing the software-related risks because the requirements kept shifting.
Had she been assessing the software-related risks throughout the weekend build?
Hadn't she been assessing the software-related risks until the prototype crashed?
Assess the software-related risks by 5 p.m. and revise the control measures.
How persistently she had been assessing the software-related risks during the crisis!
She will assess the software-related risks tomorrow after the code freeze.
She will not assess the software-related risks tonight if the unit tests still fail.
Will she assess the software-related risks once the AI module is integrated?
Won't she assess the software-related risks after the new alarms are configured?
Assess the software-related risks tomorrow and upload the signed report.
How confidently she will assess the software-related risks with the updated toolchain!
She will be assessing the software-related risks at this time next Wednesday.
She will not be assessing the software-related risks during the global summit.
Will she be assessing the software-related risks when the remote team logs in?
Won't she be assessing the software-related risks while the beta testers run scenarios?
Assess the software-related risks this week and refresh the hazard log.
How smoothly she will be assessing the software-related risks using the automated scripts!
She will have assessed the software-related risks for all safety classes by Friday.

Will she have assessed the software-related risks before the regulatory gateway closes?
Won't she have assessed the software-related risks by the time the grant is reviewed?
Assess the software-related risks by Friday and finalize the RMF summary.
How perfectly she will have assessed the software-related risks across every subsystem!
She will have been assessing the software-related risks for twelve hours by the deployment cutoff.

Will she have been assessing the software-related risks continuously until the MDR submission?

Assess the software-related risks as soon as possible and close the CAPA ticket.

korean: 그녀는 모든 설계 검토마다 의료기기 소프트웨어 관련 위험을 평가한다.
